Description: Unplayable. If transformed or removed from your deck, lose 3 Max HP.

Name: Regret
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Name: Shame
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.

Name: Writhe
Description: Unplayable. Innate.

Name: Ascender's Bane
Description: Unplayable. Ethereal. Cannot be removed from your deck.

Name: Necronomicurse
Description: Unplayable. There is no escape from this Curse.

Name: Pride
Description: Innate. At the end of your turn, put a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.

Name: Burn
Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, take 2 damage.

Name: Dazed
Description: Unplayable. Ethereal.

Name: Slimed
Description: Exhaust.

Name: Void
Description: Unplayable. Ethereal. Whenever this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy.

Name: Wound
Description: Unplayable.
